testcase.name: Follow A user using POST
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def responseGet = read('Karate/Request/Profile/GetProfile/responseGet.json') . passed * def responsePost = read('Karate/Request/UserAuthentication/Register/responsePost.json') . passed * print token ............................................................. passed Given header Authorization = 'Bearer '+ token ............................. passed Given path 'profiles','username','follow' ................................. passed And request responseGet ................................................... passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 500 ........................................................... passed
